title: Parent Wars
overview: Brace yourself for the ultimate showdownâ€”parenthood! "Parent Wars" dives into the chaos, conflicts, and comedy of modern parenting. From sideline meltdowns to schoolyard standoffs, and clashes with cops, coaches, and even fellow parents, these viral moments reveal just how far moms and dads will go to defend their kids. Packed with unbelievable footage and unexpected twists, "Parent Wars" delivers an unfiltered look at the extreme highs, shocking lows, and outright absurdity of raising the next generation.
